players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's be cautious and keep an eye on each other."

Charlie: "I will not participate in the vote. I believe that Alice and Diana are suspicious of me, but I am innocent. I will continue to observe their actions."
